text: Tony Trisciani (born April 24, 1973) is an American football coach is currently the head coach of the Elon Phoenix. Before becoming head coach, Trisciani was the defensive coordinator for Elon under head coach Curt Cignetti. Trisciani also served as the defensive backs coach and special teams coordinator at Elon in 2006. He was named the head coach of Elon on December 17, 2018 after Curt Cignetti resigned to become the head coach at James Madison. Prior to his stint at Elon, Trisciani coached High School Football in Pennsylvania at the highest school size classification. In 2012 he left the Whitehall Zephyrs for a coaching position at Villanova University. ==Head coaching record== == References == Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Elon Phoenix football coaches
title: Tony Trisciani
